description: A large, popular Amazon known for its striking yellow head, which spreads down the neck as it matures. They are highly sought after for their talking and singing ability.
temperament: Highly intelligent, social, and confident. Can be very affectionate but are prone to bonding strongly with one person and can become aggressive, especially during breeding season.
loudness: Very Loud. Possess an extremely powerful voice and are not shy about using it.
vocalization: Among the best talkers in the parrot world, capable of amazing clarity and extensive vocabularies. They are also talented singers.
dietaryNeeds: Prone to obesity. A low-fat pelleted diet is crucial, supplemented with a wide variety of vegetables. Fruit and nuts should be given sparingly.
healthPointers: Can live for 60+ years. Susceptible to obesity, fatty liver disease, atherosclerosis, and upper respiratory infections.
housing: Needs a very large and durable cage due to their size and beak strength. Not suitable for apartments. Minimum cage: 40"W x 30"D x 60"H.
